availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles L. Kremer (Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident. )

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident. Jefferson County, native. Son of Henry Kremer and Mary Kremer. Married to Anna Hendricks Kremer in Jefferson County, on September 6, 1857. Father of Henry Kremer, Charles Kremer Jr., Mary Kremer, and Louisa Kremer. Resident of Jefferson County in 1850. Resident of Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 3, p. 304B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 6, p. 270.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky,
Louisville, Ward 7, p. 4B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482708.
"Charles Kremer (1840-1893)," Find A Grave, Memorial #65249954, accessed May 6, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/65249954/charles-kremer.
